alert.note: Alert for Livingston (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 10:38PM EDT until April 15 at 11:15PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR POPE...JOHNSON...SOUTHEASTERN WILLIAMSON...SOUTHWESTERN SALINE AND NORTH CENTRAL LIVINGSTON COUNTIES... At 938 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Vienna, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Vienna, Goreville, Golconda, Lake Of Egypt Area, Dixon Springs, Stonefort, Cypress, New Burnside, Buncombe, Eddyville and Simpson. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Illinois between Mile Markers 2 and 21. Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 40 and 43. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
